description: Retrieves information about a created decoder manifest.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the decoder manifest to retrieve information about.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the decoder manifest.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the decoder manifest.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A brief description of the decoder manifest.

nested_items.name: modelManifestArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of a vehicle model (model manifest) associated with the decoder manifest.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The state of the decoder manifest. If the status is ACTIVE, the decoder manifest can't be edited. If the status is marked DRAFT, you can edit the decoder manifest.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The time the decoder manifest was created in seconds since epoch (January 1, 1970 at midnight UTC time).

nested_items.name: lastModificationTime
nested_items.description: The time the decoder manifest was last updated in seconds since epoch (January 1, 1970 at midnight UTC time).

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The detailed message for the decoder manifest. When a decoder manifest is in an INVALID status, the message contains detailed reason and help information.
